title: People make jokes about Gangplank like he is a harmless man, but he has done terrible things
body:
[](http://www.wired.com/images_blogs/threatlevel/2011/09/FBI_Anti-Piracy_Warning.jpeg)

Piracy is not a joke. It is punishable by a fine of $250,000 and up to 5 years in prison.
http://www.wired.com/images_blogs/threatlevel/2012/05/apw-2_original.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/lKawt.gif?Noredirect

replies.body: I would download a pizza. and a car. that is such a stupid anti piracy thing.

The "You wouldn't download a pizza" and "You wouldn't download a car" ads were a parody. The actual one was:


>     You wouldn’t steal a car
>     You wouldn’t steal a handbag
>     You wouldn’t steal a television
>     You wouldn’t steal a movie
> 
>     Downloading pirated films is stealing,
>     stealing is against the law,
>     PIRACY. IT’S A CRIME 

Downloading a pizza would be awesome though.
http://i.imgur.com/3MJmQHi.gif?Noredirect

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=agjW2jzy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-25T15:17:22.430+0000)
>
> I would download a pizza. and a car. that is such a stupid anti piracy thing.


Hey, in the future you just might. When 3D printers become a household thing ;)
any particular reason you typed that in twice? or did you forget you put it in the first time and then put it in again.
I would totally download a pizza!
Only the old Gangplank, now he's a badass ruthless murderer.

> [{quoted}](name=Shroom Junkie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=agjW2jzy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-25T15:06:04.997+0000)
>
> Only the old Gangplank, now he's a badass ruthless murderer.

Captain, Traditional, and Saltwater Scourge versions of him are all terrible people.
